website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the line day cooler that is rugged and durable.
pros: From a trusted brand, it boasts quality construction, solid zipper, and leak-proof design
Some users report that items stay cold longer than expected
cons: For the price, a few owners say it should keep items colder for longer than it does

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Failed (Under Warranty)
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted Yeti and a few days later they contacted me and sent me a return label. The reason I only bumped it up to 3 stars is that I have to return the bad cooler before they will ship a replacement. And because this shouldn't have happened in the first place. Original Review: I have been using the cooler 5 days a week for approximately 8 months. As you can see in the photos the zipper failed today. Does it keep things cold, heck yes it does. But for nearly $200 I would expect it to be significantly more durable. It should be noted that I DID apply the zipper lubricant regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit shocked following all the fan fare. There was no significant difference to my Igloo or Coleman, other than costing 10 times more! I ran a test on the 3, leaving them in a hot car all day. I witnessed no significant difference. I then went and purchased “yeti ice” thinking it might change things. That turned out to be just the same as other packaged ice products. Big disappointment financially and a bummer as my hope was to upgrade my cooler situation. Save your money......completely overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: john m

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome cooler...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why some people aren’t impressed by what this cooler can do. I put a relatively thin layer of ice over six beers and played in a golf tournament a few weeks ago on a 95 degree day. This cooler sat in the back in direct sunlight for about 75% of our time on the course. Got to the last tee and went for my last beer. There was still ice in the cooler and the beer was freezing cold. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: JCDeacs

customer_reviews.title: Best solution for breastmilk and travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler so I could safely transport frozen milk home from business trips for my baby. It keeps breastmilk completely frozen when you use the YETI ice packs and ziploc freezer bags with ice. I’d say it’s good for a maximum of 50-60 ounces of breastmilk, probably less if the milk is frozen as you need more ice to keep milk frozen (as opposed to just cold).
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: So excited to get this BUT...Zipper malfunctions and makes this cooler impractical.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Christmas, he has been using it the past 4 months and the teeth on the zipper are malfunctioning and won’t work properly even using the lube for the zipper per instructions. It makes it very difficult to open or close properly. Bummer for how expensive this was and how excited he was to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Tjs

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed especially given the price we paid
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be defective. Does not keep ice for more than a couple of hours. Very disappointed especially given the price we paid. We did not actually use the cooler right away (because it was a gift and I purchased it in advance). By the time my husband received the gift and used the cooler it was past the return timeframe. Sent a note to vendor but never received a response.
customer_reviews.author: BK White

customer_reviews.title: I really thought the cooler would keep everything just as cold as it was in the fridge for a really long time and was kind of disappointment to see things melting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for air and hotel travel to keep my baby's milk and food cold when traveling. I really thought the cooler would keep everything just as cold as it was in the fridge for a really long time and was kind of disappointment to see things melting. Perhaps I had too high of expectations, but kind of a bummer given the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: Failed, my breast milk thawed in less than 4 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to transport my breast milk (new baby at home), and this product FAILED me. I needed to keep it frozen for five hours - not a long time at all! But it thawed it and I had to throw everything away. I lost a weeks worth of meals for my little baby. I've never cried so hard. They advertise as "-3 degrees Celsius" and it's MISLEADING. If you want something cold, sure it'll work. But if you are actually relying on it, don't waste your money. My came-with-the-breast-pump cooler (super tiny, flimsy thing) worked JUST AS WELL as this fancy waste-of-space-cooler.
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: It’s a total waste of money...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 star because there’s no option to give ZERO stars. With that being said, do yourself a favor and don’t waste your money. Overprice cooler. It’s my lunch bag for work and doesn’t hold blue ice frozen inside my climate controlled office. I would never buy yeti products again. Very very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: L.Dibble

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cooler. Not as air tight and insulated as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. Not as air tight and insulated as the tundra series, but I think still worth the money. It kept my drinks cold for three days while in a cabin. Lasts about 1 day in the outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Maple Crest Hunts

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is extremely hard to use, but mostly it just doesn't keep cold things cold. Travelling in an air-conditioned car for 5 hours and the ice was 3/4 liquid when I arrived. Cannot hold a 6-pack of long-necks with ice. Save your money and buy an Igloo or Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome worth the cash
customer_reviews.text: Best cooler I ever bought and very compact. Keeps everything cold. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Beware, bad investment
customer_reviews.text: Teeth on the zipper breaking down , purchased August 2018. Bad $199 investment on part.. do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: BE HOME WHEN ITS DELIVERED
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fantastic, I love Yeti Brand and there seems to be no flaws. I was EXTREMELY disappointed in the shipping of it though. This was a Christmas gift for my fiancé and I'm grateful he was out running errands when it was delivered and didn't see it because the box it was delivered in it said YETI bold print all the way around which would've ruined the surprise and on top of it basically advertising to porch pirates what I bought to come steal it. Not smart shipping at all!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie_K25

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t meet expectations. Way too pricy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the deal is behind the Yeti brand. Bought this to store frozen breast milk for a long journey. Had it packed in ice as full as it would hold and the milk had thawed after a few hours. No idea how people are getting “days” of ice cold product out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Happy snapper

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but it's small
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as lunch bag and for that purpose it is really good. Since access to a refrigerator at my work is iffy, I wanted to be able to put this in my locker and keep my food cold for 7-8 hours, which is usually when I get to eat during my 12-hour shifts. With adequate freezer packs this works well. I do think that this is slightly small, even for my uses. Ideally it would be slightly larger, but the next size up is far too large for me. This is a good compromise. It cleans out easily, is very attractive and my lunch containers fit pretty well, although 1 inch larger would have been welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper, non functional.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper was hard to unzip from the beginning. My three young kids could hardly ever open it. Took it on vacation and the zipper broke on the second day. Parts of the zipper are coming off, the zipper is none functional at this point. Bought a Coleman and it works perfectly for $40. I may have used the Yeti cooler 10 times in a year. Not worth the money for the zippered versions. I’d stay away from any of these that have a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but doesn't work much better than a standard cooler at 15% of the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well built cooler, but doesn't work much better than a standard cooler at 15% of the price. I filled it with ice on a very hot day (100F) and by the next morning it was just water. I love the waterproof design and it is a nice build, but it isn't much better than the standard coolers that are $30.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: YOUR PAYING FOR THE NAME!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay you would think YETI could sew a zippered pouch in the front in case you wante to store personal items. All there is are loops, which are useless!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe

customer_reviews.title: Lunch box on steroids
customer_reviews.text: This works great for lunch box and weekend tailgating. Holds 12 beers. For the soccer games. Holds all my containers with food and drinks. Napkins and utensils For my work day. Looks great and like it will last for ever. Zipper works fine and didn’t have a hard time opening. Registered it and got a bottle opener for free. Expensive but if u like the look then worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mario mazariegos

customer_reviews.title: Return policy sucks. Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really small, I ordered it while staying at my vacation house. Once receiving it I realized I needed larger size. Instructions say I have to go to ups store and I can not print label. So went to ups store, closed on Sunday. I was to fly out Sunday evening. I return the next month to my home and want you return it and Amazon says I can’t. Will not allow me to print a label. Says has been to long. Maybe a lesson here, online shopping can has consequences. What a bummer. Sad as I have been loyal customer but will think twice going forward.
customer_reviews.author: RPC

customer_reviews.title: Very good cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This thing kept my stuff cold very well. Beware of the size, because the Hopper Flip 12 is rather bulky and if you're using it for a lunchbox, it may not fit in all places easily. I did have problems with the zipper connection at the closing end; the tension applied when I pulled the zipper closed started tearing he seams and dislodged one of the teeth. They replaced it no problem but be sure to keep it lubricated so it doesn't tear.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boire

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open and close.
customer_reviews.text: The Hopper does a good job of keeping things cold, but the zipper is EXTREMELY difficult to open and close. Even after using the lubricant included a number of times, it's a two handed and sometimes a two person job. Needless to say, it does not often come off the shelf. If you have the least bit of weakness in your hands, you'll not be happy with this product. I feel like I've totally wasted 100+ dollars.
customer_reviews.author: goldendane

customer_reviews.title: keeps things cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler for a birthday present, and my friend loves it. She took it for a five hour car ride to visit her son in college on the other side of the state(WA). She said that it worked great, keeping the seafood she'd brought as cold as if it had been in a refrigerator. I also bought the large cooler for our helicopter/firefighter son-in-law at his request for the back of his truck. I guess you need the best cooler when fighting those CA fires. On that recommendation alone, I bought one for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Landry

customer_reviews.title: Yeti is amazing - I am so lucky - got this on prime day 7/2019
customer_reviews.text: I am a big Yeti fan and see that their product is far superior to any other. I work outside on a ranch and other activities. I needed a Yeti to have plenty of cold drinks in the hot 100 degree Texas heat. Yeti does the job when others did not. I was so lucky to get this a great price on prime day. It will be with me always and all the time. Thanks Yeti - GREAT product ...... and for the next day delivery to the house - thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lighter vs of Original Yeti
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an alternative from our traditional hard yeti. Although it definitely doesn’t keep it as cool it’s so much better then a regular cooler! It’s light weight and the shoulder strap is perfect. It’s made loading and unloading the boat this summer so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Raven

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality but a hard zip
customer_reviews.text: This YETI was a gift for my husband. It arrived in perfect condition. It is very durable, thick quality material. It has a decent length strap. It fits my husbands needs completely. Unfortunately, even with the oil sent with the cooler, the zipper is extremely tough to open and close. We do understand the benefit of a strong zipper. However, if you are purchasing this item with the plan on trying to multitask and unzip the cooler, you may want to rethink. That would be the only negative or flaw I would see. Otherwise, this is a great quality cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: This cooler is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is AMAZING! I have travelled several times in the last year, leaving my breastfeeding infant at home. I brought this cooler in each trip to keep my milk cold during travel. One of my trips resulted in a 21 hour day, stuck on the same plane, trying to get home with frozen milk. This cooler passed the test! I was able to change out the ice once, and when I got home, my liquid gold was still frozen! It also fits nicely in the overhead compartment! I can’t say enough good things about this cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Held frozen food easily (totally frozen) for 24 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I recently traveled from NM to the east coast and wanted to take a variety of frozen meats and green chile. I filled the Yeti and left my house around 3:00 PM. I arrived at my destination around 3:00 PM the next day, having traveled via air. When I opened the cooler the meat and chile was still completely frozen. Disclaimer: I did cool the Yeti way down by putting it in the freezer overnight before I packed it with meat. This seems like a tough, well made product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Buntain

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Road Trips!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a lengthy road trip and it did not disappoint! Kept food and drinks ultra cold and no leaking! The softer exterior and shoulder strap made for easier transport and use of space. It was so impressive, my co-pilot decided to buy one also!
customer_reviews.author: Undisclosed

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down on ZIPPER!
customer_reviews.text: Maintains item very cold and ice does well too, however the zipper is really awful. Even using the balm stick to help with opening and closing the zipper, it’s hard either way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet. Ordered and received an ice pack for it. It’s seems that it would be good for one person’s needs. It would be easy to carry because it’s so small, but you can’t get much in it. I was disappointed. I should have gotten a bigger one or a hard one. Be careful before you invest your money.
customer_reviews.author: CMaxDavis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this yeti cooler one year ago Aug 19, 2019. Yeti coolers are expensive no matter the size. I would expect that this would have lasted longer given how expensive it is. Pretty disappointed. Probably won’t buy another as it didn’t last as long as some of my cheaper alternative coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like the size, to carry things to keep cold in the car on trips. But the interior is very small, the zipper is a pain to open and close, and it cost way too much to put up with those annoyances, especially when you can get much cheaper versions now. If I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Nice and chill in 95 deg heat
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter’s summer camp this year was all outdoors all the time. In six hours of 95 degree heat, this cooler kept two water bottles mostly frozen. My girl had ice cold drinks and her stuff stayed nice and chilled. Really can’t say enough great things about the Yeti!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty zipper / manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler from day one has presented us with zipper issues. Have had cooler just Over 2 years and the zipper is no longer functional! $300 cooler that’s been taken care of and the zipper falls off while on vacation. I hope Yeti provides a replacement or fixes it. Awaiting a response from warranty at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food colder
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my lunch every day-love the ease of cleaning this-keeps my food colder than normal coolers-w/the materials used on outside and in i'm sure they it will last longer than my previous ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Maddy

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than its worth
customer_reviews.text: Got this product on Prime day. My husband and I were certain it was advertised at a lower price. We could have purchased this anywhere for what we were charged. It’s small and poor value for the money. Should have purchased at Williams Sonoma, same price and I could have gotten to use points, very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda brown

customer_reviews.title: Yeti Portable cooler
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the stickyness of the Zipper. It is very difficult to open and close, and it did not keep the items in the cooler as cold as I had expected. Very small storage area inside.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E

customer_reviews.title: Always take it on road trips!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cooler. I was skeptical and didn’t want to spend that much money but we had a two day road trip and it kept all our snacks fresh, drinks cold and was still lightweight with a nice thick shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: The zipper on this item is worthless
customer_reviews.text: We use this for ice of course and it has not even been to the beach or in the sand, actually not even outside. Has stayed on our screened in porch since we received it. After using it about 3 times, several of the teeth for the zipper have twisted and are not in line and you can't hardly open or close it. The zipper wax that came with it is no help.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great summer cooler
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best summer cooler. The zipper is tough to use at first but it comes with lubricant for the zipper which is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: YETI makes the greatest cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler has the best quality, material and design. It's truly worth of the dollar spent. I don't do Amazon review as a career, I'm just an end user. I'd like to share my shopping experience with all other shoppers. And we should support the good brand and high quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ice cubes over 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: I put a yeti ice pack and a bag of 36 big ice cubes in my Yeti 8 Flip at 8:30 a.m. The next morning around 10:30 a.m. the Yeti ice was no longer frozen , but I still had 1/2 bag of ice cubes. Works as advertised and seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: PG county MD

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: This little cooler is amazing. We move between our two homes often and tote milk and other perishables between the two homes all the time. In the past we had a standard soft-sided cooler which just didn't keep the ice packs cold during the trip. Bought this Yeti cooler and no problem. The icepacks feel as cold as when they're pulled from the freezer before the trip in either direction. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: fc2

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$$$.
customer_reviews.text: I received this cooler in July for my birthday & couldn’t wait to use it. I used it a lot throughout July & August and, sadly, I have to say I’m disappointed. The ice melted as if it was a $50 cooler. The saying “you get what you pay for” is not true in this case. Way too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The zipper is awful....
customer_reviews.text: Great product except for the zipper. It is ridiculously hard to use and doesn't get any smoother with use. It works really well for a smaller items that you are going to use during the day. For anything longer than one day you need to purchase one of their other coolers. I highly recommend all Yeti products.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Check Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Service was good and liked the cooler but size as listed is wrong. For correct dimensions and volume visit YETI website. Too big for my use so had to return.
customer_reviews.author: hebs

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Worse most overrated cooler on the market. Does not keep items or ice cold, and a cheaper version from Walmart did the job much better. Save and get a cheaper cooler!!
customer_reviews.author: CTown

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: This is a good semi-soft Yeti. It keeps stuff cold but not quite as well as the traditional Yeti. The zipper is hard to pull, but it’s certainly lighter weight than the hard Yeti coolers. Expensive though like all Yetis.
customer_reviews.author: "illinokie"

customer_reviews.title: Yeti cooler
customer_reviews.text: Very small for the price, I returned expecting a credit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open!  leaks if tips over!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this yeti. If you use yours frequently or you’re a woman you will find it difficult to open and close it. I struggle to zip it up completely every time I open and close it it’s very annoying! Wax comes with it for zipper a little tube So every time you use it you have to lube it and it’s still difficult. For 200.00 I feel scammed Also if it tips over it leaks!!!! What!!!! Oh I’m a woman 5” 110
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Yeti impresses once again! Great cooler for the beach, camping, or fishing trips. Keeps everything as cold as it was when you put it in, love it!
customer_reviews.author: ljn321

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this every day for work, he loves it! It is extremely durable water and stain resistant and keeps drinks cool for well over 12 hours in the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: HIGH quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is name brand yes this is expensive but its worth the extra money. Buy right or buy twice. Try out a cheaper one and come to this you will see what I'm talking about...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: personal sized
customer_reviews.text: I know Yeti is an expensive brand, but I was a little disappointed in the useable size of the cooler for the price. I ordered the largest ice pack that it said would work in the cooler, but returned it because there wouldn't be room for anything else if you were able to force it in there. The biggest disappointment was that the cooler sweats near the zipper and it really doesn't hold the cold that long.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Jackson

customer_reviews.title: YETI IS THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Yeti is THE best cooler, in various sizes, on the beach on Hilton Head Island, SC. I finally broke down and bought one, and I am very glad I did. Beautiful construction. Easy to carry. Perfect size for two people going to the beach for the whole day. It is certainly higher in price than many coolers, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard V.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLY OVER RATED - VERY POOR PERFORMANCE - VERY OVER PROCED
customer_reviews.text: IT JUST SHOWS WHAT MARKETING CAN DO. This product is only marginal in performance - it is not great and probably not even good.
customer_reviews.author: RICK L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little high quality cooler. Be sure to check the size. It's not big, so know what you are getting!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not the most practical
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it holds Ice for days and days. But no pockets or storage anywhere for forks, napkins, etc. The Artic Zone Titan that I bought is actually more practical for day to day lunch and at $23 vs. $200 kind of a no brainer. If you need a cooler for camping that will hold ice for days, this can't be beaten. But for a day tripper, it is simply not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler, just expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I had won a fair amount of Amazon gift certificates making this an easy purchase. My girl and I both like it, but we wouldn't be happy if we spent our hard earned money on it. The best feature is it seals water providing the last person who zipped it up did it all the way. Might get stolen easily, so be careful where you take it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this yeti cooler! The only thing is the zipper is not smooth to open and close but not a big deal! Keep everything cool for a day!
customer_reviews.author: Alondra

customer_reviews.title: Buy it over the heavy ones & this size!! Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Love love it!!! Esp not heavy when full.. perfect size for food and drinks on my boat and turns the heads from others with the pretty color!
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: very durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it!! keep everything perfectly cold all day>
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Come on yeti at this price should be flawless
customer_reviews.text: The out side skin on out side way to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Kaui808

customer_reviews.title: Tailgating just got a little fancier
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the drinks cold. Gets a lot, and I mean a lot, of stares. Jealous much? Love this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P

customer_reviews.title: Nice Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Love this Yeti cooler. Does the job I expected it to. Not as cold as a hard sided cooler but it’s not so... A bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Summer Companion
customer_reviews.text: Can you but a cheaper version of this cooler? Yes. But I can not write a bad thing about the yeti. It has proved an incredibly companion this summer. It has been strapped to my kayak, thrown in the back of the truck and spent hours in the sun, working hard to retain the ice. Wish I could buy another but there is after three months not a single reason I have found to justify needing two.
customer_reviews.author: Boaz Burns

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: On Saturday morning I placed several bottles of pre refrigerated soda and 10 lbs of ice in my new cooler. I opened the cooler 3-4 times on Saturday and Sunday and left it in my van overnight through Monday morning. Most of the ice has turned to water but there is still some ice left and the remaining sodas are colder than if they had been in the refrigerator. I am more than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: YETI
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed which was expected, my wife loved the color so it was a gift and she is very happy with the weight and size. A bit pricy when compared to many similar products on the market today but I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: DPUC

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: As always YETI is a great product and my husband loved this cooler. Great product and keeps everything cold.
customer_reviews.author: AMEC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything cool inside after lengthy exposure to heat!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how this product is a mini-refrigerator. I have exposed my cooler for temps peaking at 108 degrees and I still had frozen ice packs inside after 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Baker

customer_reviews.title: I mean, it is a Yeti...
customer_reviews.text: I get the price point because of the brand but it was just too small for what I paid and for what I wanted. I returned it. And honestly the zipper looked like it would have been an issue - it wasn't very smooth to zip and unzip.
customer_reviews.author: SDG

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler keeps ice for days. Most amazing thing I have seen in a long time. You can tell it's well made by picking it up. Huge zipper closes tight!
customer_reviews.author: howard f

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.text: This is a recent purchase. We've only used it once. The zipper is quite stiff even after applying the provided lubricant. It did keep the beer cold but most coolers will do that. I replaced my old cooler with the Yeti in the hopes that it won't leak once the ice starts to melt. I'm hoping this won't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool all day in very hot weather.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. I have used it on 100 plus degree days several times and the contents have remained cold throughout day. It is very sturdy and will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shackne

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cold
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing I would have to say is I wish I would have bought the larger one because it really keeps things cold. I did not expect it to be so efficient
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blanchat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. The recepient was very pleased. Filled it with water and tipped it to see if it would leak. It did not
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great size for 8 drinks for the pool. Pricey but worth it. Will last me a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Hate the zipper!
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, the quality is great but just popping open the cooler to get a drink with arthritic hands is NOT easy! The zipper is tough to open, and makes getting something out of it a pain. Keeps things cold yes. But I wish a bought a larger one....6 pack in this at most.
customer_reviews.author: Cbw Productions Holly Seppala

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and missing strap
customer_reviews.text: This was a splurge gift for my daughter. When it arrived, the zipper was broken - cannot open the cooler. And there was no strap in the box. No packing slip in the box so hoping Amazon is good about the return.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Cold for Days!
customer_reviews.text: I packed a lunch, to take it fishing and ended up leaving it behind, after fleeing to avoid an encroaching Grizlly, and her cubs. I returned a day later to find my gear strewn all over the mountainside, but they didn't get to my lunch and was still cold in the Yeti.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler. Superior to other brands. Zipper closure takes some strength.
customer_reviews.text: The YETI technology is dependable. Keeps cold for a lot longer than other coolers. A nice size for a small picnic for 2.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Petruncio

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: For a yeti I thought it would hold ice a lot better than it does. I have chilled it just like I do with my hard sided yeti's but it just does not hold ice like i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome  Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Perfect for tailgating or going on a creek float! Love this item and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: excellent small cooler, but as expected it does not "hold the ice" as long as my hard side chest coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. I feel like a fool for buying this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a quality soft cooler for in the back of my motorcycle. It is a quality cooler but no way worth what I paid for it. It’s really only good for one day of keeping something cool at best. If your a brand junkie then go for it
customer_reviews.author: Ed sevold

customer_reviews.title: Very short return window
customer_reviews.text: Brought this as a gift; it was too small for their needs, so the only real disappointment is that they would only return for thirty days...the person I gave it to gave it back after the time frame had passed. I guess I will try to re-gift, but you should keep this in mind for holiday giving
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Great little cooler. I use it when fishing and while I’m on the golf course. Keeps ice and drinks cold for hours
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler, Wrong Color Shipped
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler, wrong color was sent. No biggie but it’s a present so hope they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love my Yeti. Bought the 4lb ice pack and place it on the bottom. Fill it with whatever and add ice. Stays cold forever and very sturdy. My wife complains it’s difficult to open up, but I think she’s afraid to rip it. Next purchase would be a larger size for large outings.
customer_reviews.author: Henry A Simcox

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Never tho yo would spend this much on a cooler but it’s pretty badass.
customer_reviews.author: Mrjohnnycat

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold hold or keep drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Nov. 11 2019 first time I used it ice melted in 3 hours and I didn’t even open it. Would lime to exchange if possible I have several Yeti items and have been very satisfied with them till this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: For me, their zipper on this product is awful! Even with the wax it’s too much work! It sits in a closet ....not getting used just gathering dust...
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shinozawa

customer_reviews.title: Lock the zipper All the way to the end.
customer_reviews.text: Since I just use it twice during the end of the summer so far, I could say that this is a good coolerIt’s good caring it with you while cruising around on tender( Dinghy .
customer_reviews.author: Searay

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: We have other yeti products and they are great. We are hardly able to open and close the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: christopher stultz

customer_reviews.title: Meets Yetis high standards!
customer_reviews.text: First, it looks great but more importantly it works great! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed. This cooler doesn’t hold the drinks cold as long as it claimed (even with yeti ice packs) and the zipper is extremely difficult to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stuff that will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the cooler as of yet but I know people who has the same cooler and they like it and I’m sure I will also. It cost quite a bit but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: wayne wilkey

customer_reviews.title: The zipper is too hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is too hard to open. Also, it is $45 cheaper to buy it on the yeti website. So salty about that!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

product_meta.title: YETI Hopper Flip Portable Cooler
feature_bullets: The Hopper Flip 18 has ColdCell Insulation, a closed-cell foam that offers superior cold-holding to ordinary soft coolers, with a capacity of up to 16 cans plus ice
The Hopper Flip 18 features a 100% leakproof HydroLok Zipper and the wide-mouth opening means great accessibility and visibility to contents
The DryHide Shell is waterproof and resistant to mildew, punctures, and abrasions so it will hold its own when faced with the hazards of the wild
The only personal cooler that’s game for full days in the tree stand, early mornings in the duck boat, or afternoons on the water
The Hopper Flip 18 dimensions are 15 2/3 in long x 10 1/5 in wide x 12 3/5 in high and an empty weight of 5.1 lbs.
